explanation: [0-0] In a repair shop, a man sits on a motorcycle that is propped up on a red floor with chains, its wheels on rollers. Earphones, ropes, and other items are hanging on the wall. There is a display screen in the upper right corner of the frame, and a light is on in the ceiling.

[0-9] The man then starts the motorcycle; its rear wheel spins rapidly, the body shakes forward continuously, and the exhaust pipe gradually turns red. Then the man releases the throttle and reaches out to turn off a switch on the front right.

[9-11] Subsequently, the motorcycle's shaking gradually subsides, the exhaust pipe emits blue flames, and a logo appears in the picture, below which are the subtitles "BT" in white on a red background and "MOTO" in white.
